semantics.label: Show title screen
semantics.description: If checked, a title screen will show up when starting.

fields.label: Maximum height
fields.description: Maximum height of the medium. 15rem will comply with common H5P standards.

fields.label: Personality name
fields.description: The personality name will be used to associate answers with their respective personalities.

fields.label: Type
fields.description: Optional content to display on the result screen.

fields.label: Maximum height
fields.description: H5P will usually determine the height based on the width. Set a maximum height here in CSS units (px, rem, etc.).

fields.label: Type
fields.description: Optional content to display above the question text.

fields.label: Maximum height
fields.description: H5P will usually determine the height based on the width. Set a maximum height here in CSS units (px, rem, etc.).

fields.label: Allow multiple choices
fields.description: If checked, the user can select multiple answers for this question.

fields.label: Personalities
fields.description: A comma separated list of personality names associated with this answer.

importantDescription.description:
• Add the name of a personality that should receive a score of +1 when the option is chosen.
  • You can specify other scores including negative values by adding an equality sign (=) followed by the score.
  • Personality names need to be separate by a comma (,).

fields.label: Image
fields.description: Optional image. All options for this question need an image in order to show up. No images will be shown in chat mode.

fields.label: Alternative text
fields.description: Alternative text for screen readers.

fields.label: Animation
fields.description: The wheel of fortune animation will only use the images associated with personalities if all personalities have an image associated with them.

fields.label: Personality image position
fields.description: Set whether an image associated with the resulting personality should be displayed in the background or inline between the personality name and the description.

fields.label: Show animations
fields.description: Check to turn on animations.

fields.label: Show progress bar
fields.description: Check to show progress bar.

fields.label: Visual appearance
fields.description: Set what the overall appearance should be like.

fields.label: Base color
fields.description: Set the base color that will determine the color for the buttons, the button fill animations and some other visual elements.

fields.label: Progressbar Color
fields.description: Set the color of the progress bar.

fields.label: Not enough valid questions
fields.default: It seems that there is no valid question set. Please try checking for valid personality names.
fields.description: Message when the author did not enter enough valid questions.

fields.label: Not enough valid personalities
fields.default: It seems that there are not enough valid personalities set. Please try checking for missing names or duplicate names.
fields.description: Message when the author did not enter enough valid personalities.

fields.label: Text in progress bar
fields.description: @current and @total are placeholders and will be replaced with the respective values.

fields.label: Skip
fields.description: Label of "Skip" button.

fields.label: Restart
fields.description: Label of "Restart" button.

fields.label: Download
fields.description: Label of "Download" button.

fields.label: Review answers
fields.description: Label of "Review answers" button.

fields.label: Not finished
fields.default: The quiz was not yet finished.
fields.description: Used as report answer if results are requested prematurely.

fields.label: Your choices
fields.description: Label for the user's choices on the result screen.

fields.label: Wheel of fortune started
fields.default: The wheel of fortune started spinning. Please wait a moment.
